channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Predator (Neutral Killer)
channel.description: > ## [color = lightslategray] The Predator [/color] >**[color = lightslategray] Neutral Killer [/color]** >**On The Hunt(Passive)** Immune to Occupation and death at night. >**Last Laugh(Passive)** If killed at night, Kill all visitors visiting you. Does not work if jailed. >**End(Day)** Only Clickable If you have 5 trophies. Wins the game. You can choose if you wish to leave or stay. Staying will allow you to gain more trophies, allowing more gold at the end. The amount of Gold you get is dependant on the amount of trophies you have. >**Blaster(Night)** Fire a beam at someone, removing all death immunity on them for the next night. 3 Uses, doesn’t inform the target. >**Skin(Night)** Kill a player, giving you a trophy. The Prince, Mastermind, Cult Leader, and the King give an extra Trophy. Infinite Uses. >_Your objective is to Collect 5 Trophies, and leave the castle._ >**Immune to Conversion**

Only successful attempts

I meant like attempts, if a person visited someone in jail the ability fails, but they still show at attempting it?

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Predator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
Sam17z:

The major flaw in this is what prevents someone from saying I am the predator let me kill 5 people which the BD agree, then I will be a contract killer for BD?

This class isn’t too hard to fake claim, meaning The Sorcerer could claim it. So yes, the real Predator could claim it, but other scum can claim it as well. Meaning that BD is going to have to think about if the Predator is a real one or fake one. Like alchemist in a sense. But a NK.

Read full topic

The major flaw in this is what prevents someone from saying I am the predator let me kill 5 people which the BD agree, then I will be a contract killer for BD?

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Predator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Lightsin:

End(Day) Only Clickable If you have 5 trophies. Wins the game. You can choose if you wish to leave or stay. Staying will allow you to gain more trophies, allowing more gold at the end. The amount of Gold you get is dependant on the amount of trophies you have.

So theoretically only 2 people from the scum faction can lose? All the neuts win, with this Neutral Killer whom obtained 5 trophies - BD and BD king. The major flaw in this is what prevents someone from saying I am the predator let me kill 5 people which the BD agree, then I will be a contract killer for BD?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Predator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Lightsin:

On The Hunt(Passive) Immune to Occupation and death at night.
Last Laugh(Passive) If killed at night, Kill all visitors visiting you.

So this NK is immune to death at night, but if killed at night it kills all its visitors? It seems passive 2 is useless.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Predator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
I made it Neutral special since it’s goal isn’t like a standard NK goal. Will change it though, since now looking back, possessor+Predator+Unseen= 3 KPN. Not really good for anyone, including Predator.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Predator (Neutral Killer)

item.description:
Is this like and NK because it seems like an NK. I don’t want reaper + predator killing the everyone. So let’s either change the Killing ability or change the class to an NK or can this class. Because NK + This + Scum = massive kpn /=\ good for the game.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Predator (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
The Predator

Neutral Killer
On The Hunt(Passive) Immune to Occupation and death at night.
Last Laugh(Passive) If killed at night, Kill all visitors visiting you. Does not work if jailed.
End(Day) Only Clickable If you have 5 trophies. Wins the game. You can choose if you wish to leave or stay. Staying will allow you to gain more trophies, allowing more gold at the end. The amount of Gold you get is dependant on the amount of trophies you have.
Blaster(Night) Fire a beam at someone, removing all death immunity on them for the next night. 3 Uses, doesn’t inform the target.
Skin(Night) Kill a player, giving you a trophy. The Prince, Mastermind, Cult Leader, and the King give an extra Trophy.
Infinite Uses.
Your objective is to Collect 5 Trophies, and leave the castle.
Immune to Conversion

Read full topic
